ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: yes, good opportunities to hear informative talks and meet great scientists
Seminar course. Excellent exposure to research in chemistry from a variety of scholars.

This is the required organic chemistry seminar series. I would recommend attending these seminars, they provide an opportunity to see speakers from other institutions and get exposure to the current literature and fields of interest. It also gives a personal interaction with names from the literature and helps connect you to the field at large.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: nice to see current work being done
Excellent exposure to research in chemistry from a variety of scholars.

This seminar series is essential to graduate education, as it allows you to see speakers from outside of your immediate specialty and helps to inform your overall knowledge of current chemistry. They will contribute enormously to my overall graduate career.
